Name: Martinez (with Old Tom gin)
Ingredients: 1 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist expressed & discarded. Adorn with skewered Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
Review: Use an authentic-tasting distilled old tom gin that's balanced rather than overly sweet, and you'll have a fabulous cocktail.
Nutrition: One serving of Martinez (with Old Tom gin) contains 159 calories
